name: n8n-nodes-base.code
semantic_context: Run custom JavaScript or Python code

mode.name: mode

options.name: Run Once for All Items
options.description: Run this code only once, no matter how many input items there are

options.name: Run Once for Each Item
options.description: Run this code as many times as there are input items

mode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsCode.name: jsCode
jsCode.description:
JavaScript code to execute.

Tip: You can use luxon vars like $today for dates and $jmespath for querying JSON structures. Learn more.
jsCode.ai_hint:
JavaScript code to execute.

Tip: You can use luxon vars like $today for dates and $jmespath for querying JSON structures. Learn more.

notice.displayName:
Debug by using print() statements and viewing their output in the browser console.

The native Python option does not support _ syntax and helpers, except for _items in all-items mode and _item in per-item mode.
notice.name: notice

pythonCode.name: pythonCode
pythonCode.description:
Python code to execute.

Tip: You can use built-in methods and variables like _today for dates and _jmespath for querying JSON structures. Learn more.
pythonCode.ai_hint:
Python code to execute.

Tip: You can use built-in methods and variables like _today for dates and _jmespath for querying JSON structures. Learn more.

conditional_rules: IF @version == 1 AND mode == 'runOnceForAllItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsCode'
IF @version == 1 AND mode == 'runOnceForEachItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsCode'
IF @version == 2 AND language == 'javaScript' AND mode == 'runOnceForAllItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsCode'
IF @version == 2 AND language == 'javaScript' AND mode == 'runOnceForEachItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsCode'
IF language IN ["python", "pythonNative"] AND mode == 'runOnceForAllItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'pythonCode'
IF language IN ["python", "pythonNative"] AND mode == 'runOnceForEachItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'pythonCode'
